attributes.action: create a criminal law, that charges people who cause offence to the proud return and march of british troops through our british towns.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: its a simple ask!  to create a law that makes it a criminal offence to enrage the public by protesting in a way that is not in the majorities intrest, nor in the minorities intrest, the main example being the few muslims who shouted abuse and held signs at the soliders who marched through Luton.   this enraged the population and and seriously deserves new laws to control this... can you imagine what would have happend during 1940's, if that was germans shouting at britsh troops in luton returning????   they would be in prison, ..........

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
